documenation_text: Please check the documantion on github:
intervall_help: Intervall in seconds, to lookup the pv logic
starttime_help: Time in second, how long wait to chek the min power
stoptime_help: Time in second, how long wait to chek the power to stop
grid_id_help: ID of the datapoint to show the grid power in watt
grid_factor_help: Factor/Multiplier fpr Conversion the GridId value
wallbox_enable_id_help: ID of the datapint to enable/disable the wallbox (boolean)
wallbox_ampere_id_help: ID of the datapint to set the dynamic ampere
wallbox_ampere_step_help: Ampere to change the Wallbox to the next step (up/down)
vehicle_pluged_id_help: Vehicle-ID of the datapoint to show the pluged status (boolean)
vehicle_soc_id_help: Vehicle-ID of the datapoint to show the SoC status (1-100)
